quote: By the grace of reality and the nature of life, man—every man—is an end in himself, he exists for his own sake, and the achievement of his own happiness is his highest moral purpose.
quote_letters: BY THE GRACE OF REALITY AND THE NATURE OF LIFE MAN-EVERY MAN-IS AN END IN HIMSELF HE EXISTS FOR HIS OWN SAKE AND THE ACHIEVEMENT OF HIS OWN HAPPINESS IS HIS HIGHEST MORAL PURPOSE
